content:
Craft an item of type: dark_prismarine_slab
inventory=[{"type": "structure_void", "quantity": 51, "index": 16}, {"type": "command_block", "quantity": 55, "index": 17}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 3, "index": 20}, {"type": "dragon_head", "quantity": 43, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_diorite", "quantity": 42, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a dark_prismarine_slab, I need to place three dark_prismarine blocks in a row in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will first move one dark_prismarine block from slot 20 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 20 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: dark_prismarine_slab
inventory=[{"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "structure_void", "quantity": 51, "index": 16}, {"type": "command_block", "quantity": 55, "index": 17}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "dragon_head", "quantity": 43, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_diorite", "quantity": 42, "index": 44}]
thought: I have placed one dark_prismarine block in slot 1, so I will now move another one to slot 2, which is to the right of slot 1.
act: move from slot 20 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: dark_prismarine_slab
inventory=[{"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "structure_void", "quantity": 51, "index": 16}, {"type": "command_block", "quantity": 55, "index": 17}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "dragon_head", "quantity": 43, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_diorite", "quantity": 42, "index": 44}]
thought: I have placed two dark_prismarine blocks in slots 1 and 2, so I will now move the last one to slot 3, which is to the right of slot 2.
act: move from slot 20 to slot 3 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: dark_prismarine_slab
inventory=[{"type": "dark_prismarine_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "structure_void", "quantity": 51, "index": 16}, {"type": "command_block", "quantity": 55, "index": 17}, {"type": "dragon_head", "quantity": 43, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_diorite", "quantity": 42, "index": 44}]
thought: I have successfully crafted six dark_prismarine_slabs, so I will now move them from the crafting slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
